entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:23 PM PDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 12:00 PM PDT Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4
